Room.Name: Entrance to the Dead Forest
Room.Description: The land around you becomes more ravaged and decimated. Trees that were lush and green to the north seem more twisted and dried here. To the south the forest appears darker and more foreboding, as if something has corrupted the very essence of it.

Room.Name: Near the Entrance to the Dead Forest
Room.Description: Here inside the beginings of the forest there are signs of wildlife, but they are few and far between. The normal forest sounds of birds and small animals in the underbrush seem absent and the darkness around you is most unnatural. The trees around you seem to be twisted and dead, like something had drained the life from them.

Room.Name: Within the Dead Forest
Room.Description: Around you the trees appear dead and lifeless. Even the small vegetation that has grown on the forest floor has a taint of evil to it. Faint mist swirls around you and sends beams of light scattering into the darkened forest.

Room.Name: Within the Dead Forest
Room.Description: Around you the trees appear dead and lifeless. Even the small vegetation that has grown on the forest floor has a taint of evil to it. Faint mist swirls around you and sends beams of light scattering into the darkened forest.

Room.Name: Before a collapsed tree
Room.Description: The forest stops short at a huge tree that has fallen down here. Devestated and twisted foliage surround it but nothing seems to be regrowing.

Room.Name: Within the Dead Forest
Room.Description: Around you the trees appear dead and lifeless. Even the small vegetation that has grown on the forest floor has a taint of evil to it. Faint mist swirls around you and sends beams of light scattering into the darkened forest.

Room.Name: Before a dark clearing
Room.Description: Around you the trees appear dead and lifeless. Even the small vegetation that has grown on the forest floor has a taint of evil to it. Faint mist swirls around you and sends beams of light scattering into the darkened forest. To the east you can see a clearing in the forest, and large ominous shapes move slowly through the shadows and mist.

Room.Name: Within the Dead Woodlands
Room.Description: Around you the trees appear dead and lifeless. Even the small vegetation that has grown on the forest floor has a taint of evil to it. Faint mist swirls around you and sends beams of light scattering into the darkened forest. Around you large ominous shapes move slowly through the shadows.

Room.Description: Around you the trees appear dead and lifeless. Even the small vegetation that has grown on the forest floor has a taint of evil to it. Faint mist swirls around you and sends beams of light scattering into the darkened forest. Around you large ominous shapes move slowly through the shadows.

Room.Name: Within the Dead Woodlands
Room.Description: Around you the trees appear dead and lifeless. Even the small vegetation that has grown on the forest floor has a taint of evil to it. Faint mist swirls around you and sends beams of light scattering into the darkened forest. Around you large ominous shapes move slowly through the shadows. To the south you can see the forest gets even darker...

Room.Name: At a Darkened Clearing
Room.Description: Around you the trees appear dead and lifeless. Even the small vegetation that has grown on the forest floor has a taint of evil to it. Faint mist swirls around you and sends beams of light scattering into the darkened forest. To the east the sound of large, ungainly creatures can be heard, along with a lot of glutteral growling and hissing.

Room.Name: On a path in the Dead Forest
Room.Description: Around you the trees appear dead and lifeless. Even the small vegetation that has grown on the forest floor has a taint of evil to it. Faint mist swirls around you and sends beams of light scattering into the darkened forest. To the east the sound of large, ungainly creatures can be heard, along with a lot of glutteral growling and hissing.

Room.Name: On a path in the Dead Forest
Room.Description: Around you the trees appear dead and lifeless. Even the small vegetation that has grown on the forest floor has a taint of evil to it. Faint mist swirls around you and sends beams of light scattering into the darkened forest. To the north the sound of large, ungainly creatures can be heard, along with a lot of glutteral growling and hissing.

Room.Name: A bloody part of the Dead Forest
Room.Description: The ground here is covered in sticky green ichor and scaly bits of flesh. The smell of putrid waste and wafts in the air, mixing in with the stench of dead foliage and carrion matter.

Room.Name: A bloody part of the Dead Forest
Room.Description: The ground here is covered in sticky green ichor and scaly bits of flesh. The smell of putrid waste and wafts in the air, mixing in with the stench of dead foliage and carrion matter.

Room.Name: On a path in the Dead Forest
Room.Description: Around you the trees appear dead and lifeless. Even the small vegetation that has grown on the forest floor has a taint of evil to it. Faint mist swirls around you and sends beams of light scattering into the darkened forest.

Room.Name: On a path in the Dead Forest
Room.Description: Around you the trees appear dead and lifeless. Even the small vegetation that has grown on the forest floor has a taint of evil to it. Faint mist swirls around you and sends beams of light scattering into the darkened forest.

Room.Name: Before a Black River
Room.Description: The forest ends here before a dark river. Small malformed shapes squirm and thrash about in the liquid but it is hard to see exactly what they are over the mist that hangs loosely across the water. A makeshift bridge has been partially erected over the river.

Room.Name: On a decayed bridge
Room.Description: You stand upon a decaying and decrepit bridge made from some kind of dead tree trunk. Below you a hideous black river flows past, tiny shapes splashing and hissing within. The bridge heads north and south.

Room.Name: On a decayed bridge
Room.Description: You stand upon a decaying and decrepit bridge made from some kind of dead tree trunk. Below you a hideous black river flows past, tiny shapes splashing and hissing within. The bridge heads north and south.

Room.Name: On the South side of the Bridge
Room.Description: You stand at the south side of a decaying old bridge made from the trunk of a dead tree. Around you mist lies softly upon the forest floor, partially hiding the decay and death. Only twisted and crumpled trees lie all around you. To the north the bridge crosses over a black river, while south there appears to be a large dark clearing.

Room.Name: Within a Dark Clearing
Room.Description: The dead forest seems not quite so bad here. Trees are still twisted but not quite so badly, and some greenery still exists in sparse spots. All around you the dark clearing extends. For off to the south you hear the faint sounds of real forest animals.

Room.Name: Within a Dark Clearing
Room.Description: The dead forest seems not quite so bad here. Trees are still twisted but not quite so badly, and some greenery still exists in sparse spots. All around you the dark clearing extends. For off to the south you hear the faint sounds of real forest animals.

Room.Name: Within a Dark Clearing
Room.Description: The dead forest seems not quite so bad here. Trees are still twisted but not quite so badly, and some greenery still exists in sparse spots. All around you the dark clearing extends. For off to the south you hear the faint sounds of real forest animals.

Room.Name: Within a Dark Clearing
Room.Description: The dead forest seems not quite so bad here. Trees are still twisted but not quite so badly, and some greenery still exists in sparse spots. All around you the dark clearing extends. For off to the south you hear the faint sounds of real forest animals.

Room.Name: Within a Dark Clearing
Room.Description: The dead forest seems not quite so bad here. Trees are still twisted but not quite so badly, and some greenery still exists in sparse spots. All around you the dark clearing extends. For off to the east and south you hear the faint sounds of real forest animals.

Room.Name: Within a Dark Clearing
Room.Description: The dead forest seems not quite so bad here. Trees are still twisted but not quite so badly, and some greenery still exists in sparse spots. All around you the dark clearing extends. For off to the east and south you hear the faint sounds of real forest animals.

Room.Name: Within a Dark Clearing
Room.Description: The dead forest seems not quite so bad here. Trees are still twisted but not quite so badly, and some greenery still exists in sparse spots. All around you the dark clearing extends. For off to the south you hear the faint sounds of real forest animals.

Room.Name: Within a Dark Clearing
Room.Description: The dead forest seems not quite so bad here. Trees are still twisted but not quite so badly, and some greenery still exists in sparse spots. All around you the dark clearing extends. For off to the south you hear the faint sounds of real forest animals.

Room.Name: Within a Dark Clearing
Room.Description: The dead forest seems not quite so bad here. Trees are still twisted but not quite so badly, and some greenery still exists in sparse spots. All around you the dark clearing extends. For off to the south you hear the faint sounds of real forest animals.

Room.Name: Within a Dark Clearing
Room.Description: The dead forest seems not quite so bad here. Trees are still twisted but not quite so badly, and some greenery still exists in sparse spots. All around you the dark clearing extends. To the south the forest seems to become more lush and green...

Room.Name: Within a Dark Clearing
Room.Description: The dead forest seems not quite so bad here. Trees are still twisted but not quite so badly, and some greenery still exists in sparse spots. All around you the dark clearing extends. Something seems a bit different about this part of the clearing...

Room.Name: On a sparsely vegetated path
Room.Description: You stand upon a path with sparse but green foliage. To the north the forest becomes dead and dark, with a large clearing all you can see. South of here the region seems to get greener and more like a REAL forest.

NPC.name: lesser troll
NPC.description: This troll is big and disgusting. It's green hide partially hides it in the surrounding wastes, but not enough for your liking.
NPC.longDescription: A horrible troll is here scavenging through the wasted forest.

NPC.name: greater troll
NPC.description: This troll is big and disgusting. It's green hide partially hides it in the surrounding wastes, but not enough for your liking.
NPC.longDescription: A greater troll is here scavenging through the wasted forest.

NPC.name: lesser naga
NPC.description: A demon naga, mean and cruel. Born of dark magic and wanting nothing but pain and suffering.
NPC.longDescription: A huge serpent with a man's face hisses and slithers by.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger StayArea Warrior AssistVnum
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Infrared DetectIllusion

NPC.name: anti anti-ranger scout
NPC.description: This scout has been sent to check and make sure the devestation of the forest is still prevailing and that nobody has come to prevent the decay.
NPC.longDescription: An evil looking anti-ranger scout is here watching the forest.

Item.Name: trollsword troll sword
Item.LongDescription: A large double-bladed troll sword is here.

Item.Name: troll skin robe
Item.LongDescription: A piece of disgusting green troll skin lies on the ground.

Item.Name: slayer sword troll-slayer
Item.LongDescription: A large sword named 'Troll-slayer' is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This sword seems to have been designed specifically for the slaying of trolls. Like someone wanted to have something special in case they needed to suddenly control a large number of trolls or something.

Item.Name: dagger naga-slayer
Item.LongDescription: A wickedly sharp dagger is sticking into the ground here.
